channel.title: 728 PrestigeScape | All Skills | Summoning | 24/7 Vps | Join Today! |
channel.description:
[center][font=times new roman][size=24pt]~PrestigeScape 728~[/size][/font][/center] [center][size=18pt]DownLoad Links are below![/size][/center] Website: Coming soon *Within 24 hours* WebClient: Coming soon *As well with the website* Please note We still are under construction so please be patient with all updates -Thank you :)
[center][size=18pt]What we have to offer![/size][/center]
[center]Features: - 24/7 VPS 4gb Hosted - No Lag - Stable Eco - Daily Challenges - Clue Scrolls - Donor Zone - Old and new Runescape Armor - Loyalty point system with shop - Various shops. - Dominion Tower - Lava Flow Mining - Jadinko Lair - Frost Dragons - Bork - Tormented Demons - New Godwars - Squeal of fortune. - Bone's on altar. - Hunter. - All the GodWars Dungeons. - Fully working Nex. - Curses, ancients etc. - Working Revenants. - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Custom Dung - Working chaotics - Working Flowers and Dicing - Warriors Guild - Random Events - Custom Home teles - Full abyss -And many much more! *Note we are still in development so please be patient with server updates! :)[/center]
[center][size=24pt]~Media~[/size][/center]
[center]<3 Skilling <3[/center]
[center][img]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/3062/201303112216561364x728.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]<3 90% Working G.E *Minor bugs that need to be fixed please be patient with me <3[/center]
[center][img]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/3647/gepicforserver.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]<3 All Working Interfaces!~! <3[/center]
[center][img]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/6299/serverpic2.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]<3 ~Vote Shop For Days~ <3[/center]
[center][img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/8181/runescapewannabe.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]~All Skills Working~[/center]
[center][img]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/5608/allskillsworkingpic.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=24pt]~~Downloads~~[/size][/center]-
[center][size=18pt]~~MediaFire~~[/size][/center]
[center][size=10pt]http://www.mediafire.com/?yi9iu5daxa0a7p5[/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]~~Uppit~~[/size][/center]
[center][size=10pt]http://up.ht/XEDyMU[/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Staff :)[/size][/center] [center][size=10pt]Owner - Khaos AKA - Saeede[/size][/center] [center][size=10pt]Co - Owner - Kyle (Me)[/size][/center] [center][size=10pt]Developer - Jaded AKA Rick [/size][/center] [center][size=10pt]Mod - Rayn[/size][/center]
[center][size=36pt]<3 Server Start Up Challenge!~! <3[/size][/center] [center][size=10pt]- OK so being the fact that all skills work on the server, I am programming(Putting together a server start up challenge) to encourage players to play hard and be respectful and you will be rewarded. *On that note*Players who succeed in all of the following will be rewarded with the completionis't cape, and any item of your choice. [/size][/center] [center]-Must have 99 in all skills of Coarse.[/center] [center]-Must have Mined 5000 Gold ore. [/center] [center]-Must have fished 5000 Rocktail.[/center] [center]-Must have cut 5000 magic logs[/center] [center]-Must have burned 5000 magic logs (Obtaining inferno adaze)[/center] [center]-Must have completed 500 laps on the gnome agility course.[/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=24pt]~PrestigeScape 728~[/size][/font][/center]
[center][size=18pt]DownLoad Links are below![/size][/center]
Website: Coming soon Within 24 hours
WebClient: Coming soon As well with the website
Please note We still are under construction so please be patient with all updates -Thank you

[center][size=18pt]What we have to offer![/size][/center]

[center]Features:

  • 24/7 VPS 4gb Hosted
  • No Lag
  • Stable Eco
  • Daily Challenges

  • Donor Zone
  • Old and new Runescape Armor
  • Loyalty point system with shop

  • Frost Dragons

  • Squeal of fortune.

  • Hunter.
  • All the GodWars Dungeons.
  • Fully working Nex.
  • Curses, ancients etc.
  • Working Revenants.

  • Fight Kiln

  • Custom Dung
  • Working chaotics

    *Note we are still in development so please be patient with server updates! :)[/center]
